Bibliographic References: PAdd, no. A 291, pi. 5 aNon Sepcifiedb; ArchReps 1955, p. 57 and pi. 5 a"
Imagery Description: (a) Two nude women at a laver, about which flies a small white bird with a wreath; to left, a third nude woman kneeling and looking into a mirror, above her flies a small white Eros; a large piece of white drapery hangs down from above, (b) large female head rising from a floral calyx, with a small white Eros flying above
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
